title: Expository Paragraph Writing Curriculum Using Reverse Engineering-Based Graphic Organizers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sentence structure comprehension and foundational writing skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, targeting learners preparing for professional careers (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze the key components (topic sentence, supporting evidence, conclusion) of expository paragraphs using graphic organizers
Learners can reconstruct the structure and logical flow of model paragraphs into graphic organizers by applying reverse engineering techniques
Learners can visualize the idea development process of expository paragraphs and apply it to actual writing using color-coded graphic organizers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
